name: IndianCulturalGuide
0:
”Alexa ask Indian Culture Guide how many languages are there”
”Alexa ask Indian Culture Guide what religions are there in India”
”Alexa ask Indian Culture Guide what festivals are celebrated in India”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian culture guide
Developer Terms of Use
des: India has more than 10,000 years of rich culture and history. This is a small effort to bring out this information through technology. The skill goes in-depth about Indian culture. The user can ask questions about food, clothing, architecture, etc, and increase their awareness about Indian culture. Anyone can make use of this skill to learn more about India. The skill also will inform the user about Indian cultural events in North Carolina. This skill is developed as a part of a Girl Scout Gold Award project with the goal of keeping everyone informed about Indian culture.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
